com.isaacrf.epicbitmaprenderer.core

Class EpicBitmapCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isaacrf.epicbitmaprenderer.core.EpicBitmapCache

  • public class EpicBitmapCache
extends java.lang.Object
    An epic Bitmap cache to store data on both memory and disk cache. This class auto manages caches concurrency, size and exposes methods for handling.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EpicBitmapCache()
      Basic constructor, builds the memory cache automatically.

    • Method Summary

      Deletes memory and disk cache contents.

      Gets Bitmap from Disk Cache by its key.

      Gets Bitmap from Memory Cache by its key.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EpicBitmapCache

        public EpicBitmapCache()
        Basic constructor, builds the memory cache automatically.

    • Method Detail

      • initDiskCache

        public void initDiskCache(android.content.Context context)
        Initializes memory cache. This method uses context to find app's own cache directory.
        Parameters:
        context - Context from where lib is being called. This is used to get application's cache dir for disk cache.

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String key,
                android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat inDiskCompressFormat,
                int inDiskCompressQuality)
        Adds or updates a Bitmap to Memory and Disk cache compressed in format and quality specified, identified by a key.
        Parameters:
        key - ID of the Bitmap to retrieve it later.
        bitmap - Bitmap to be stored.
        inDiskCompressFormat - Format to compress the image (JPEG, PNG, etc.) to store on disk cache.
        inDiskCompressQuality - Compress quality percentage of the image, from 0 to 100, to store on disk cache.

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String key,
                android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                java.lang.String outMimeType,
                int inDiskCompressQuality)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds or updates a Bitmap to Memory and Disk cache compressed in format and quality specified, identified by a key.
        Parameters:
        key - ID of the Bitmap to retrieve it later.
        bitmap - Bitmap to be stored.
        outMimeType - Image's mime type (usually in form 'image/format', e.g. 'image/png'), to automatically obtain the compress format to store on disk cache.
        inDiskCompressQuality - Compress quality percentage of the image, from 0 to 100, to store on disk cache.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - In case Mime Type specified is not image.

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String key,
                android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)

        Adds or updates a Bitmap to Memory and Disk cache identified by a key.

        NOTE: This method uses JPEG format 100% quality by default when compressing image to store it on disk cache. To manually specify format and quality of compression in disk cache, use put(String, Bitmap, Bitmap.CompressFormat, int) instead.

        Parameters:
        key - ID of the Bitmap to retrieve it later
        bitmap - Bitmap to be stored

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String key)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Removes an entry from memory and disk cache.
        Parameters:
        key - Identifier of value to be removed from cache.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case entry could not be removed from disk cache due to an IO Error.

      • getBitmapFromMemCache

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmapFromMemCache(java.lang.String key)
        Gets Bitmap from Memory Cache by its key.
        Parameters:
        key - ID of the Bitmap to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Bitmap object if found, null otherwise.

      • getBitmapFromDiskCache

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmapFromDiskCache(java.lang.String key)
        Gets Bitmap from Disk Cache by its key.
        Parameters:
        key - ID of the Bitmap to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Bitmap object if found, null otherwise.

      • getBitmapFromCache

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmapFromCache(java.lang.String key)
        Tries to retrieve a Bitmap by its key from Memory Cache, and if not found, from Disk Cache.
        Parameters:
        key - ID of the Bitmap to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Bitmap object if found, null otherwise.

      • clear

        public void clear()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes memory and disk cache contents.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case disk cache could not be cleared due to an IO error.

      • getDiskCacheDir

        public static java.io.File getDiskCacheDir(android.content.Context context,
                                           java.lang.String uniqueName)
        Creates a unique subdirectory of the designated app cache directory. Tries to use external but if not mounted, falls back on internal storage.
        Parameters:
        context - Context from where EpicBitmapCache is being used.
        uniqueName - Unique name for cache directory.
        Returns:
        File pointing to cache directory
